generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with trees and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings line the right side of the road, featuring windows and architectural details typical of urban structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along both sides of the road and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Two individuals are standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including one in the foreground and others further down the street.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing green on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are present, including a blue circular sign with a white arrow and a pedestrian crossing sign on the right side of the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the road, running along the edge of the sidewalk.
